name: Neon Geometry Dash
description:
You have different levels, where you will have to travel down space, moving left and right avoiding collisions.

Each level is a new adventure with new mechanics and soundtracks.

Neon: Geometry Dash has the following features:

• Rhythm-based Action game.
• Many levels with unique soundtracks!
• Vertical action game with simple look but addictive mechanics.
• Practice mode.
• Very easy but challenging game.
